steps.title: Your environment
steps.content: This page helps you compare how you've been feeling with other activity in your life.

steps.title: Your mood
steps.content: Select the question that captures the aspect of your mood you're interested in here...

steps.title: Wellbeing chart
steps.content:
This chart will show you your recent responses to the selected mood question.

You can remove any data point by clicking on it. This will popup a confirm box so you can't delete anything accidentally.

steps.title: Add data point
steps.content: Click here to add a data point

steps.title: Your environment
steps.content: Select the environmental factor that you want to compare here. We've selected 'social' which, if you've connected Twitter or Facebook, shows your levels of social media activity.

steps.title: Environment chart
steps.content: Your selected environmental factor is charted out here.

steps.title: Logging environmental data
steps.content: Although you can't manually enter data for 'social' activity, you can for other types. We've just selected 'alcohol' for you...

steps.title: Add alcohol data point
steps.content: Click on plus icons to add data.

steps.title: Back to the future
steps.content: Review and compare older data by clicking here.
